src:
Crno-beli odleteli u Mančester: Videli smo da možemo
06 Nov 2019, 10:08 by Darko
Fudbaleri Partizana otputovali su u Mančester, gde će u četvrtak od 21 čas, odigrati utakmicu 4. kola Lige Evrope protiv slavnog engleskog kluba.
Trener crno-belih Savo Milošević na put je poveo sledećih 20 igrača:
Golmani: Vladimir Stojković, Nemanja Stevanović, Filip Kljajić
Odbrana: Nemanja Miletić, Bojan Ostojić, Strahinja Pavlović, Igor Vujačić, Slobodan Urošević, Rajko Brežančić
Vezni red: Saša Zdlejar, Aleksandar Šćekić, Bibras Natho, Zoran Tošić, Aleksandar Lutovac, Filip Stevanović, Takuma Asano, Sejbuba Suma, Lazar Pavlović
Napad: Đorđe Ivanović, Umar Sadik.



Pred poletanje iz Beograda, mladi defanzivac crno-belih Strahinja Pavlović rekao je da je jedan od zadataka njegovog tima da na Old Trafordu ne primi gol.
– Mančester je na našem stadionu za nijansu bio bolji, ali mi nismo iskoristili naše šanse. Sada imamo bolji uvid u njihovu igru i sigurno ćemo u meč ući opreznije. Videli su i oni koliko mi možemo da budemo opasni i da možemo da igramo sa njima. Najvažnije je da mi pozadi odradimo posao na najvišem mogućem nivou i da pokušamo da ne primimo gol, rekao je Pavlović.
Mladi reprezentativac smatra da nema puno razlike u tome u kakvom će sastavu „crveni đavoli“ izaći na teren.
– Imaju dugačak roster igrača. Svi su dosta kvalitetni. Imaju mnogo utakmica u Premijer ligi. Koji god sastav da izađe na teren mi ćemo se potruditi da pobedimo, poručio je Pavlović.
text:
Black and whites fly to Manchester: We saw we could
06 Nov 2019, 09:08 by Darko
Partizan footballers have traveled to Manchester, where they will play the fourth leg of the Europa League on Thursday at 9pm against the famous English club.
Black and white coach Savo Milosevic took the following 20 players on the road:
Goalkeepers: Vladimir Stojkovic, Nemanja Stevanovic, Filip Kljajic
Defense: Nemanja Miletic, Bojan Ostojic, Strahinja Pavlovic, Igor Vujacic, Slobodan Urosevic, Rajko Brezancic
Liaison row: Sasa Zdlejar, Aleksandar Scekic, Bibras Natho, Zoran Tosic, Aleksandar Lutovac, Filip Stevanovic, Takuma Asano, Sejbuba Suma, Lazar Pavlovic
Attack: Djordje Ivanovic, Umar Sadik.



Before taking off from Belgrade, young black and white defender Strahinja Pavlovic said that one of his team's tasks was not to score at Old Traford.
- Manchester did better in our stadium, but we didn't take our chances. Now we have a better insight into their game and we will surely enter the match more carefully. They have also seen how dangerous we can be and play with them. The most important thing is that at the back we do the job at the highest possible level and try not to score, Pavlovic said.
The young national team doesn't think there is much difference in the composition of the Red Devils.
- They have a long roster of players. They are all quite quality. They have many Premier League games. Whatever squad comes out on the field, we will do our best to win, Pavlovic said.
